(Affects Magic Beings Only [magiconly], Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster alters the magical bonds of a magical being, making it serve him instead of its creator.
